# --description-- The current width of the menu will always take up 80% of the `body` element's width. On a very wide screen, the coffee and dessert appear far apart from their prices. Add a `max-width` property to the `menu` class with a value of `500px` to prevent it from growing too wide. # --hints-- You should set the `max-width` property to `500px`. ```js const hasMaxWidth = new __helpers.CSSHelp(document).getCSSRules().some(x => x.style['max-width'] === '500px'); assert(hasMaxWidth); ``` Your `.menu` element should have a `max-width` of `500px`. ```js const menuMaxWidth = new __helpers.CSSHelp(document).getStyle('.menu')?.getPropertyValue('max-width'); assert(menuMaxWidth === '500px'); ``` # --seed-- ## --seed-contents-- ```html Cafe Menu
